list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: producing or capable of producing much noise; easily audible.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they were kept awake by loud music
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ đã được thức dậy bởi âm nhạc lớn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: with a great deal of volume.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they shouted as loud as they could
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ hét to như họ có thể
